Modification_Detail.description: Initial creation of the context product.

External_Reference.description: Dunhuang Gobi Desert Ecology and Environment Research Station of the Cold and Arid Regions, Environmental and Engineering Research Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

External_Reference.reference_text: Han, Q., J.Qu, Z. Dong, K. Zhang, and R. Zu, (2015), Air density effects on aeolian sand movement: Implications for sediment transport and sand control in regions with extreme altitudes or temperatures, Sedimentology, 62(4), 1024-1038.

Instrument.name: Dunhuang Portable Wind Tunnel
Instrument.description: Portable, blower-style, open circulation wind tunnel powered by gasoline. Overall length is ~12.9 m with a working section of 8.4 m length by 0.6 m width by 0.6 m height.
